bill.summary:
Defund Amnesty Act of 2015
This bill prohibits the use of funds appropriated or otherwise made available to implement or enforce specified immigration-related policies in:
the memoranda issued by the Secretary of Homeland Security on November 20, 2014, the memoranda issued by the President on November 21, 2014, and any substantially similar memorandum issued after November 21, 2014.
